title: COSMEX 2022
description: ASEAN’s Only Exhibition on Manufacturing Technologies, Machinery, Packaging & ODM/OEM Services for Cosmetics, Personal Care & Dietary Supplement Products Whether it be ultra-personalized, all-inclusive cosmetics trend or super-innovative technologies that allow customers to discover the right beauty regimes for them no matter what their appearances, COSMEX 2022 will unveil the trends and uncover new business opportunities.
